name: Panzer League - KennyJam 2019
description:
A game made in 48 hours for kennyjam 2019 with the theme "Unlikely Combinations"

The goal of the game is to get the ball in the net, pretty simple. If there weren't tanks defending the goal!

Ram and shoot the ball whilst dodging enemy fire, avoid mines and don't let the enemy score.

CONTROLS - 

W/A FORWARD / REVERSE

AD = TURN

SPACE = FIRE
